item.description:
Cinema City is doing a series of classic movies on Sundays at 11:00am. I am going to schedule meetups for all of them even if I cannot attend, to let people know about them.

For those who don't know about "Rebel Without A Cause" - starring Tony James Dean, Natalie Wood, Sal Mineo, Jim Backus, Ann Doran - the short description is that it's about the new kid at school trying to fit in and win the cute girl, who has her own struggles. I think of it every time I go to a planetarium. It's a true American classic film, go to see it if you can. Even if you have seen it before, see it again on the big screen where it belongs.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: "Rebel Without A Cause" - Cine Classics at Cinema City at the Palace
